pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/ClaudiusMinimus)ClaudiusMinimus$(/l) (aka: CM) is a Minecraft mod pack creator. He is a member of the $(l:https://www.curseforge.com/members/claudiusminimus)CurseForge community$(/l).$(br2)In the real world, CM is a member of the $(l:https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org)Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints$(/l), which is one of his primary passions. First God, then family, and church, which means each of you is a brother or sister.
To learning more, please visit my YouTube Channel, $(l:https://www.youtube.com/@miraclesfromtheashes)Miracles from the Ashes$(/l).
